Query the Ensembl REST API

queryEnsembl.Rd

Query the Ensembl REST API

queryEnsembl(path, query, grch37 = TRUE)

Arguments

path

Character: API path
query

Character: API query
grch37

Boolean: query the Ensembl GRCh37 API? if FALSE, query the most recent API

Value

Parsed response or NULL if no response

Examples

path  <- "overlap/region/human/7:140424943-140624564"
query <- list(feature = "gene")
psichomics:::queryEnsembl(path, query, grch37 = TRUE)
#>           source feature_type version external_name        biotype
#> 1 ensembl_havana         gene       8          BRAF protein_coding
#> 2        ensembl         gene       1            U6          snRNA
#>           gene_id seq_region_name strand
#> 1 ENSG00000157764               7     -1
#> 2 ENSG00000271932               7      1
#>                                                                   description
#> 1 v-raf murine sarcoma viral oncogene homolog B [Source:HGNC Symbol;Acc:1097]
#> 2                               U6 spliceosomal RNA [Source:RFAM;Acc:RF00026]
#>              logic_name assembly_name              id     start       end
#> 1   ensembl_havana_gene        GRCh37 ENSG00000157764 140419127 140624564
#> 2 ncrna_homo_sapiens_37        GRCh37 ENSG00000271932 140583872 140583978

path  <- "lookup/symbol/human/BRCA2"
query <- list(expand=1)
psichomics:::queryEnsembl(path, query, grch37 = TRUE)
#> $assembly_name
#> [1] "GRCh37"
#> 
#> $db_type
#> [1] "core"
#> 
#> $logic_name
#> [1] "ensembl_havana_gene"
#> 
#> $Transcript
#>        end display_name                 biotype species
#> 1 32973347    BRCA2-001          protein_coding   human
